Text: i have a bounche of rare instructional dvds and when i convert them, the quality is awful, im using xilisoft dvd platinum, what i'm doing wrong??!

One software would not really do anything.

DGIndex, AviSynth , Virtual Dub, Xvid Encoder, DVD Decrypter and BeLight/Be Sweet is all you need to do conversions and encodings. A pretty complicated task at first but then is easy once you get it :)
